verses.verse: To the angel<WG32> of the church<WG1577> of Ephesus<WG2179> write<WG1125>; These things<WG3592> says<WG3004> he that holds<WG2902> the seven<WG2033> stars<WG792> in<WG1722> his<WG846> right hand<WG1188>, who walks<WG4043> in<WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of the seven<WG2033> golden<WG5552> candlesticks<WG3087>;

I know<WG1492> your<WG4675> works<WG2041>, and<WG2532> your<WG4675> labor<WG2873>, and<WG2532> your<WG4675> patience<WG5281>, and<WG2532> how<WG3754> you can<WG1410> not<WG3756> bear<WG941> them which are evil<WG2556>: and<WG2532> you have tried<WG3985> them which say<WG5335> they are<WG1511> apostles<WG652>, and<WG2532> are<WG1526> not<WG3756>, and<WG2532> have found<WG2147> them<WG846> liars<WG5571>:

And<WG2532> have endured<WG941>, and<WG2532> have<WG2192> patience<WG5281>, and<WG2532> for<WG1223> my<WG3450> name<WG3686>'s sake<WG1223> have labored<WG2872>, and<WG2532> have<WG2577> not<WG3756> fainted<WG2577>.
Nevertheless<WG235> I have<WG2192> somewhat against<WG2596> you<WG4675>, because<WG3754> you have left<WG863> your<WG4675> first<WG4413> love<WG26>.

Remember<WG3421> therefore<WG3767> from from where<WG4159> you have fallen<WG1601>, and<WG2532> repent<WG3340>, and<WG2532> do<WG4160> the first<WG4413> works<WG2041>; or else<WG4190> I will come<WG2064> to you<WG4671> quickly<WG5035>, and<WG2532> will remove<WG2795> your<WG4675> lampstand<WG3087> out of<WG1537> its<WG846> place<WG5117>, except<WG3362> you repent<WG3340>.
But<WG235> this<WG5124> you have<WG2192>, that<WG3754> you hate<WG3404> the deeds<WG2041> of the Nicolaitans<WG3531>, which<WG3739> I also<WG2504> hate<WG3404>.

He that has<WG2192> an ear<WG3775>, let him hear<WG191> what<WG5101> the Spirit<WG4151> says<WG3004> to the churches<WG1577>; To him<WG846> that overcomes<WG3528> will I give<WG1325> to eat<WG5315> of<WG1537> the tree<WG3586> of life<WG2222>, which<WG3739> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of the paradise<WG3857> of God<WG2316>.

And<WG2532> to the angel<WG32> of the church<WG1577> in Smyrna<WG4668> write<WG1125>; These things<WG3592> says<WG3004> the first<WG4413> and<WG2532> the last<WG2078>, which<WG3739> was<WG1096> dead<WG3498>, and<WG2532> is alive<WG2198>;

I know<WG1492> your<WG4675> works<WG2041>, and<WG2532> tribulation<WG2347>, and<WG2532> poverty<WG4432>, (but<WG1161> you are<WG1488> rich<WG4145>) and<WG2532> I know the blasphemy<WG988> of them which<WG3588> say<WG3004> they<WG1438> are<WG1511> Jews<WG2453>, and<WG2532> are<WG1526> not<WG3756>, but<WG235> are the synagogue<WG4864> of Satan<WG4567>.

Fear<WG5399> none<WG3367> of those things which<WG3739> you shall<WG3195> suffer<WG3958>: behold<WG2400>, the devil<WG1228> shall<WG3195> cast<WG906> some of<WG1537> you<WG5216> into<WG1519> prison<WG5438>, that<WG2443> you may be tried<WG3985>; and<WG2532> you shall have<WG2192> tribulation<WG2347> ten<WG1176> days<WG2250>: be<WG1096> faithful<WG4103> to<WG891> death<WG2288>, and<WG2532> I will give<WG1325> you<WG4671> a crown<WG4735> of life<WG2222>.

He that has<WG2192> an ear<WG3775>, let him hear<WG191> what<WG5101> the Spirit<WG4151> says<WG3004> to the churches<WG1577>; He that overcomes<WG3528> shall<WG91> not<WG3364> be hurt<WG91> by<WG1537> the second<WG1208> death<WG2288>.

And<WG2532> to the angel<WG32> of the church<WG1577> in<WG1722> Pergamos<WG4010> write<WG1125>; These things<WG3592> says<WG3004> he which has<WG2192> the<WG4501> sharp<WG3691> sword<WG4501> with two edges<WG1366>;

I know<WG1492> your<WG4675> works<WG2041>, and<WG2532> where<WG4226> you dwell<WG2730>, even where<WG3699> Satan<WG4567>'s seat<WG2362> is<WG2532>: and you hold fast<WG2902> my<WG3450> name<WG3686>, and<WG2532> have<WG720> not<WG3756> denied<WG720> my<WG3450> faith<WG4102>, even<WG2532> in<WG1722> those days<WG2250> where<WG1722><WG99999> Antipas<WG493> was my<WG3450> faithful<WG4103> martyr<WG3144>, who<WG3739> was slain<WG615> among<WG3844> you<WG5213>, where<WG3699> Satan<WG4567> dwells<WG2730>.

But<WG235> I have<WG2192> a few things<WG3641> against<WG2596> you<WG4675>, because<WG3754> you have<WG2192> there<WG1563> them that hold<WG2902> the teaching<WG1322> of Balaam<WG903>, who<WG3739> taught<WG1321> Balac<WG904> to cast<WG906> a stumblingblock<WG4625> before<WG1799> the sons<WG5207> of Israel<WG2474>, to eat<WG5315> things sacrificed to idols<WG1494>, and<WG2532> to commit fornication<WG4203>.
So<WG3779> have<WG2192> you<WG4771> also<WG2532> them that hold<WG2902> the teaching<WG1322> of the Nicolaitans<WG3531>, which thing<WG3739> I hate<WG3404>.

Repent<WG3340>; or<WG1487> else<WG3361><WG99999> I will come<WG2064> to you<WG4671> quickly<WG5035>, and<WG2532> will fight<WG4170> against<WG3326> them<WG846> with<WG1722> the sword<WG4501> of<WG4750> my<WG3450> mouth<WG4750>.

He that has<WG2192> an ear<WG3775>, let him hear<WG191> what<WG5101> the Spirit<WG4151> says<WG3004> to the churches<WG1577>; To him<WG846> that overcomes<WG3528> will I give<WG1325> to eat<WG5315> of<WG575> the hidden<WG2928> manna<WG3131>, and<WG2532> will give<WG1325> him<WG846> a white<WG3022> stone<WG5586>, and<WG2532> in<WG1909> the stone<WG5586> a new<WG2537> name<WG3686> written<WG1125>, which<WG3739> no man<WG3762> knows<WG1097> except<WG1487><WG99999> he that receives it<WG2983>.

And<WG2532> to the angel<WG32> of the church<WG1577> in<WG1722> Thyatira<WG2363> write<WG1125>; These things<WG3592> says<WG3004> the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316>, who has<WG2192> his<WG846> eyes<WG3788> like to<WG5613> a flame<WG5395> of fire<WG4442>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> feet<WG4228> are like<WG3664> fine brass<WG5474>;

I know<WG1492> your<WG4675> works<WG2041>, and<WG2532> love<WG26>, and<WG2532> service<WG1248>, and<WG2532> faith<WG4102>, and<WG2532> your<WG4675> patience<WG5281>, and<WG2532> your<WG4675> works<WG2041>; and<WG2532> the last<WG2078> to be more<WG4119> than the first<WG4413>.

Nevertheless<WG235> I have<WG2192> a few things<WG3641> against<WG2596> you<WG4675>, because<WG3754> you suffer<WG1439> that woman<WG1135> Jezebel<WG2403>, which calls<WG3004> herself<WG1438> a prophetess<WG4398>, to teach<WG1321> and<WG2532> to seduce<WG4105> my<WG1699> servants<WG1401> to commit fornication<WG4203>, and<WG2532> to eat<WG5315> things sacrificed to idols<WG1494>.
And<WG2532> I gave<WG1325> her<WG846> space<WG5550> to<WG2443> repent<WG3340> of<WG1537> her<WG846> fornication<WG4202>; and<WG2532> she repented<WG3340> not<WG3756>.

Behold<WG2400>, I<WG1473> will cast<WG906> her<WG846> into<WG1519> a bed<WG2825>, and<WG2532> them that commit adultery<WG3431> with<WG3326> her<WG846> into<WG1519> great<WG3173> tribulation<WG2347>, except<WG1437><WG99999> they repent<WG3340> of<WG1537> their<WG846> deeds<WG2041>.

And<WG2532> I will kill<WG615> her<WG846> sons<WG5043> with<WG1722> death<WG2288>; and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the churches<WG1577> shall know<WG1097> that<WG3754> I<WG1473> am<WG1510> he which searches<WG2045> the minds<WG3510> and<WG2532> hearts<WG2588>: and<WG2532> I will give<WG1325> to<WG5213> every one of<WG1538> you<WG5213> according to<WG2596> your<WG5216> works<WG2041>.

But<WG1161> to you<WG5213> I say<WG3004>, and<WG2532> to the rest<WG3062> in<WG1722> Thyatira<WG2363>, as many as<WG3745> have<WG2192> not<WG3756> this<WG3778> teaching<WG1322>, and<WG2532> which<WG3748> have<WG1097> not<WG3756> known<WG1097> the depths<WG899> of Satan<WG4567>, as<WG5613> they say<WG3004>; I will put<WG906> upon<WG1909> you<WG5209> no<WG3756> other<WG243> burden<WG922>.
But<WG4133> that which<WG3739> you have<WG2192> already hold fast<WG2902> until<WG3739><WG99999> I come<WG2240>.
And<WG2532> he that overcomes<WG3528>, and<WG2532> keeps<WG5083> my<WG3450> works<WG2041> to<WG891> the end<WG5056>, to him<WG846> will I give<WG1325> power<WG1849> over<WG1909> the nations<WG1484>:

And<WG2532> he shall rule<WG4165> them<WG846> with<WG1722> a rod<WG4464> of iron<WG4603>; as<WG5613> the vessels<WG4632> of a potter<WG2764> shall they be broken to shivers<WG4937>: even as<WG5613> I<WG2504> received<WG2983> of<WG3844> my<WG3450> Father<WG3962>.
And<WG2532> I will give<WG1325> him<WG846> the<WG792> morning<WG4407> star<WG792>.
He that has<WG2192> an ear<WG3775>, let him hear<WG191> what<WG5101> the Spirit<WG4151> says<WG3004> to the churches<WG1577>.
